Text: RE NDA Cycle TestedThis message is a followup to the one we sent to you last week If you would prefer not to receive any more reminders of this event please follow the instructions at the bottom IMAGE October October St Regis Monarch Beach Resort Spa Dana Point CA Click the following link to download the full NDA programstaticndagenericpdfhtm To Registernda To Sponsor Demo Room For More Informationpubeventseventdetailcfmeid Dear Jeffrey The tragic events of September th have had a profound and lasting impact on all of us in the Red Herring community corporate leaders and entrepreneurs technologists and venture capitalists From October th to th at Red Herrings annual NDA conference we plan to get back to business Our speakers and presenting companies will debate the technology trends that will change the future of business and discuss the methods successful companies have used to innovate in a difficult market In addition Red Herring will use NDA to raise funds for the victims of the September th tragedy Red Herring has organized several charitable activities for the twoday conference and will donate for each registered participant to a fund to help victims in New York and Washington DC This years NDA will take Red Herrings predictive look at the biggest ideas still to come over the next to months Presenters include Mike Homer former head of marketing at Netscape and current founder and CEO of wireless startup Kontiki John Seeley Brown chief innovation officer Entrepreneuring Dr Paul Jacobs Executive Vice President Qualcomm Dr Eric Schmidt Chairman and CEO Google Dave House CEO and Chairman Allegro Networks Roger McNamee Cofounder and General Partner Integral Capital Partners Paul Deniger Chairman and CEO Broadview Esther Dyson founder Edventure Holdings Steve Jurvetson and Tim Draper managing partners with Draper Fisher Jurvetson Join Red Herring and the alist of NDA speakers as we Debate and discuss the trends and opportunities that will define business innovation in the year to come Provide invaluable insight and tools you need to innovate out of a market cycle straight from the front lines of emerging startups and corporate Rlabs Get a first hand look at young emerging companies promising to define the future of the biotech storage software wireless optics nanotechnology and Internet infrastructure sectors Explore reallife case studies and business solutions that have succeeded and failed in the current marketplace We hope you will join us for a unique thoughtleadership conference that will peer into the current market and explore the trends and opportunities that will drive the continuing wave of business innovation TO REGISTER NDA Includes Sunday activities and Monday evenings Charity Reception Visit nda Call or ampm EDT Email Your Code to Register DNPA NDA is before October after October Special pricing exists for select members of the venture capital and entrepreneur community For more information email NDA SPONSORS Gold Compaq KornFerry International Silver Grant Thornton meVC NASDAQ Qualcomm Book Signing Sponsor M Squared Bronze Rutberg Company LLC Demo Room Sponsor High Tech Maui Partner Organization ITradefaircom Interested in sponsoring Contact Heidi Skupien or UNSUBSCRIBE INSTRUCTIONS Red Herring has sent you the following message as part of our efforts to keep you informed on the latest developments and issues surrounding business technology You have received this message because you are a member of the venture capital community If you would prefer not to receive such messages in the future please reply with the word unsubscribe in the Subject line This message was sent to JEFF NRONCOM and is intended for Jeffrey Skilling of Enron If you have received this message in error or did not grant permission to receive it please forward it to Copyright Red Herring Communications All rights reserved xjf IMAGE
